title: Integrated Farming Practices
text: Equipment reliability analysis. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We start work before sunrise during harvest. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We design protocols for herd health management. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We record yields and monitor feed intake. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality.
